text: Jordin Brianna Sparks (born December 22, 1989 in Phoenix, Arizona) is an American recording artist, singer and actress. On May 23, 2007, she won the 6th season of the reality television show American Idol. She was the youngest winner of the talent show. She has released two studio albums Jordin Sparks and Battlefield. She has a vocal range of a mezzo-soprano. == Other websites == *Jordin Sparks official webpage *Jordin Sparks Planet Category:American Idol winners Category:Singers from Phoenix, Arizona Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Mezzo-sopranos Category:People from Glendale, Arizona
title: Jordin Sparks
